mapper.select: SELECT inv.*, invDTL.invoiceDtlId, invDTL.invoiceDtlQty, invDTL.price, itDTL.colorName, itDTL.colorImg, it.itemName FROM invoiceDTL invDTL, invoice inv, itemDTL itDTL, item it WHERE invDTL.invoiceId = inv.invoiceId AND invDTL.itemDtlId = itDTL.itemDtlId AND itDTL.itemId = it.itemId AND inv.customerId = #{customerId}
